recommended_degree: Sistem Komputer, Ilmu Komputer, Teknik Informatika, Sistem Informasi (Sarjana)
job_description: The intern will support IT Managed Services, including user device onboarding and provisioning, executing IT service administration tasks, and contributing to IT projects such as Cybersecurity, Managed Services, and IT Asset Management. This position is onsite at the Gunung Putri plant.
